lead_paragraph: The San Jose Sharks have come a long way from their original home at the Cow Palace with its undersized ice rink and lingering aroma from its use for rodeos and other livestock events.

headline.print_headline: Sharks' 25-Year Trip Takes Them From Cow Palace to Cup Final
headline.main: Sharks' 25-Year Trip Takes Them From Cow Palace to Cup Final
